response.original_title: Golem Time: Pictured from Events in an Old Chronicle
response.overview: In this video essay, critic David Cairns and historian Fiona Watson discuss the conception and production of Paul Wegener's 'Der Golem: Wie er in die Welt kam' (1920), as well as the film's ambiguous depiction of Jews and Jewish culture.
response.title: Golem Time: Pictured from Events in an Old Chronicle
